thread.title: BB Merah Putih BlackBerry Aurora official product page has gone live
thread.title_full: BB Merah Putih BlackBerry Aurora official product page has gone live

author: Bla1ze
title: BB Merah Putih BlackBerry Aurora official product page has gone live
text:
The new site confirms pretty much everything we learned earlier about the BlackBerry Aurora, including the specs, available colors and more.

With device images and press images already out there and pre-order pages having gone up across multiple Indonesian retailers, it was only a matter of time before the BB Merah Putih put the official BlackBerry Aurora product page live as well. The new site confirms pretty much everything we learned earlier about the BlackBerry Aurora, including the specs, available colors and more.
Read More Â»
